description:
Get your hands on thousands of comics with a monthly subscription.

InkyPen includes comics from across the globe. From big name publishers to indies and webcomics. Including comics such as Hellboy (Dark Horse), Robotech (Titan), Transformers and Judge Dredd (IDW),  Sarah's Scribbles (Andrews McMeel Universal) and many, many more.

Either read InkyPen yourself or set parental control restrictions in the app so you can share age-appropriate comics with younger audiences.

Read great classics and standalone series. Read comics set in the worlds of your favorite games, tv-shows and books. Read across the widest range of genres and tastes available in one app. Subscribe to read it all without limitation! Only on the Nintendo Switch system.
name: InkyPen
